title: Voice of a Serial Killer
overview: Locked in police station vaults are interviews with some of world's most notorious murderers and serial killers.This thrilling CBS Reality Original series takes a fresh approach by bringing to life the nerve jangling real audio taken from the killer's confessions, including Robert Black, Kim Edwards, Ted Bundy and Elizabeth Wettlaufer. Using actors and lip-sync technology, the audio will be brought to life and will allow the audience will be taken inside the confessions of serial killers, face to face with evil.These police interrogations will be complimented by drama recon of the crimes themselves and further supported by expert and Police interviews.
